metadata.dc:title: Macro Organisms of Contra Costa County
metadata.dc:description: A digital Field Guide for Many Living Things
metadata.dc:creator: Michael A. Peters
metadata.schema:accessibilitySummary: This book only contains static content. All image files have alternative text and some have a long description. Audio content does not contain human speech so captions are not used, descriptions of audio content however is provided. This book attempts to conform to WCAG 2.1 AA requirements. And compliance failures with WCAG 2.1 AA should be considered a bug and reported. When finances and skill allow, AAA compliance is sought.

earl:testSubject.dct:title: Macro Organisms of Contra Costa County

earl:result.dct:description: Element has no ARIA role matching its epub:type

earl:test.dct:title: epub-type-has-matching-role
earl:test.dct:description: Ensure the element has an ARIA role matching its epub:type

help.dct:title: ARIA role
help.dct:description: ARIA role should be used in addition to epub:type
